articles.author: Upstox News Desk
articles.title: Bloodbath on Dalal street: NIFTY50 and SENSEX plunge over 2.6% amid global selloff - Upstox
articles.description: Indian benchmark indices declined sharply on Monday, on the back of heavy global selloff. Market breadth was extremely weak on Monday and broader markets witnessed a steeper fall with all sectoral indices ending in red.
